tool_description: Generates detailed cleanup execution plans with scheduling, ordering, and safety checks based on retention decisions and dependencies.

updated_decisions.description: Final retention decisions in format: path|action|reason

execution_schedule.description: When to execute: immediate, tonight, weekend, or specific datetime

batch_size.description: Number of files to process in each batch (1-1000)

safety_checks.description: Enable additional safety validations before deletion

max_deletion_size_gb.description: Maximum total size to delete in single execution (0.1-1000 GB)

error_messages: Invalid decisions format: Each entry in updated_decisions must follow format 'path|action|reason'.
Invalid execution schedule: Use 'immediate', 'tonight', 'weekend', or ISO 8601 datetime format.
Parameter out of range: batch_size must be 1-1000, parallel_threads must be 1-10, max_deletion_size_gb must be 0.1-1000.
Decisions limit exceeded: Maximum 10000 retention decisions can be processed in a single plan.
Invalid email format: Provide a valid email address for notifications or leave as default None.
usage: Provide updated_decisions array to generate cleanup plans. Configure execution timing, batch processing, and safety parameters. Set notification_email to receive completion updates.

plan_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated cleanup plan

execution_batches.description: Ordered batches of operations in format: batch_id|operation_count|estimated_duration

safety_warnings.description: Safety warnings and recommendations for the cleanup plan

plan_summary.description: Executive summary of the cleanup plan including total files, size, and estimated duration
